name: quikshope_client
description: QuikShope Client for frontend theme development

scripts.gitpush: git add . && git commit -m "Git push" && git push
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run uglify
scripts.dist: mkdirp dist && browserify --standalone QuikShopeClient lib/index.js > dist/client.js

author: Tanmoy Sarkar [QuikShope Team]
